
```{r}

hjp <- read_csv("hjp.csv")

wmns <- hjp %>%
  filter(`Room Use` == "030J WOMEN RSTRM") %>%
  summarize(total_sqft = sum(Area))


mens <- hjp %>%
  filter(`Room Use` == "030I MENS RESTRM")%>%
  summarize(total_sqft = sum(Area))

```
